00028     public function indexAction()
00029     {
00030         if ($this->_requests->hasGet() && $this->_requests->gets()->action == 'changepw') {
00031             if ($this->_requests->hasPost() && ($pw = $this->_requests->posts()->password) && ($pwrt = $this->_requests->posts()->passwordrt) && ($pw == $pwrt)) {
00032                 $this->getView()->pwc = $this->_getModel()->changePw(hash('sha512', $pw), Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getUid());
00033             } else
00034                 $this->getView()->pwc = false;
00035         }
00036         $this->getView()->userData = Galleria_Auth::getObject();
00037         $this->getView()->userPics = $this->_getModel()->getUserPics(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getUid());
00038     }
00039 
00047     public function before()
00048     {
00049         if (Galleria_Auth::isLogged())
00050             return true;
00051         $this->setNext('login','index');
00052         return false;
00053     }
